moves.name: Bug Bite
moves.effect: If the target is holding a Berry, the user steals it and eats it.

moves.name: Bug Buzz
moves.effect: On a successful hit, roll 1d6. On a 6, the target's Insight is lowered by 1.

moves.name: Megahorn
moves.effect: This move has a high chance of missing.

moves.name: Leech Life
moves.effect: The user regains HP equal to half the damage dealt.

moves.name: Quiver Dance
moves.effect: The user raises its Special, Insight, and Dexterity by 1 for the rest of the scene.

moves.name: Sticky Web
moves.effect: Lays a hazard on the opponent's side of the field. Grounded Pokémon that switch in have their Dexterity lowered by 1.

moves.name: U-turn
moves.effect: After dealing damage, the user may immediately switch out with another Pokémon in the party.

moves.name: First Impression
moves.effect: This move has Priority, but it can only be used on the first turn the user is in battle.

moves.name: Defend Order
moves.effect: Raises the user's Vitality and Insight by 1.

moves.name: Heal Order
moves.effect: The user recovers half of its maximum HP.

moves.name: Twineedle
moves.effect: Hits twice. On each hit, roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target is Poisoned.
